## Instructions

This module exercise is a series of questions **posted on Blackboard** that check your understanding of the material contained in the [module 6 lecture videos][module06-lectures].
This should be completed **after** you have finished watching the lecture videos.

There is no time limit and you may attempt the module exercises up to three times.
Your grade will be the highest score you receive across your attempts.
